name: Ysra
appearance: Stocky and river-strong with rope scars on both palms, woven hair charms of reed and amber, and a coat patched with a dozen crews’ colors.
character: Wry and steady, a mother-wolf to boatfolk and a stone in any negotiation.
talents: hears silt shifts through boat timbers
charms angry crowds down with a story
predicts fog-thick by taste of air
flaws: won’t admit fear of deep channels
dreams: win co-authority over trade-hour hinge openings
build a guild school to keep river-kids out of smuggling
recover a lost dock-bell from the Night of the Unmoored
secrets: Hides a smuggler’s shrine at Pilgrim’s Stair used as a shelter in worst storms
Has been paying a hush tithe to stop route leaks she suspects come from the Rookery
Kept evidence that a Parliament clerk altered a salvage writ against her people
